1.title: Fireside Chat
1.plot: Welcome to the very special fireside chat edition of Talks Machina. If you had questions after the campaign wrap-up special, this is the place for you.

2.title: Talking Critical Role - Curious Beginnings
2.plot: The adventures of Critical Role's party, Vox Machina, are discussed and dissected with host Brian Wayne Foster on this show-after-the-show. The show also features cast member appearances, fan creations, questions and interactions--plus giveaways.

3.title: Talking Critical Role - A Show of Scrutiny
3.plot: The adventures of Critical Role's party, Vox Machina, are discussed and dissected with host Brian Wayne Foster on this show-after-the-show. The show also features cast member appearances, fan creations, questions and interactions--plus giveaways.

4.title: Talking Critical Role - The Midnight Chase
4.plot: After Critical Role each week, everyone needs to take a second to breathe and process. Talks Machina brings Critical Role cast members together with host Brian Wayne Foster to chat about the latest happenings on the hit show, answer audience questions, and more.

5.title: Talking Critical Role - Disparate Pieces
5.plot: Sam, Liam, and Marisha join Brian on the couch for a new Talks Machina intro and even get a special message from Ashley.

22.title: Talking Critical Role - Stalker in the Swamp
22.plot: Liam O'Brien and Marisha Ray stop by to chat about the last episode of Critical Role, episode 21, "Stalker in the Swamp" and what their new ally means for the campaign.

23.title: Talking Critical Role - Lost Treasures
23.plot: Travis Willingham and Laura Bailey join the discussion by delving into the Mighty Nein's aquatic themed antics on last week's Critical Role episode 22, "Lost Treasures"

31.title: Talking Critical Role - The Journey Home

41.title: Talking Critical Role - Laura's One Shot
41.plot: With the Critical Role (2015) team visiting the United Kingdom for the first time when the 25th October episode should have aired live, they recorded a one shot filler episode with Laura Bailey as the Game Master. On this episode of Talks Machina (2016), host Brian W. Foster chats with Laura and Travis Willingham about the episode, puts questions from the audience to them, fusses over Laura and Travis' son Ronin Willingham and more.

4.title: Talking Critical Role - Deadly Echoes: Episode #82
4.plot: Brian Wayne Foster is joined by Matthew Mercer, Taliesin Jaffe, Marisha Ray, and Travis Willingham to discuss Critical Role "Deadly Echoes," give out prizes, and more.

5.title: Talking Critical Role - The Deceiver's Stand: Episode #83
5.plot: Featured guest Sully joins Laura Bailey, Ashley Johnson, Taliesin Jaffe, Marisha Ray, and Brian Wayne Foster for Talks Machina. They discuss the previous episode of Critical Role, show some fan art, and give away a prize.

6.title: Talking Critical Role - Loose Ends: Episode #84
6.plot: Brian Wayne Foster is joined by Travis Willingham, Liam O'Brien, Matthew Mercer, and Sam Riegel, for Talks Machina. They discuss Critical Role Episode #84, giving out fan art and gif of the week prizes, and answering questions.

7.title: Talking Critical Role - Episodes #85 and #86
7.plot: Brian Wayne Foster is joined by the entire Critical Role cast (minus Ashley Johnson) to give away prizes, answer questions, and discuss Critical Role episodes 85 and 86.

8.title: Talking Critical Role - Onward to Vesrah: Episode #87
8.plot: Brian Wayne Foster is joined by Kit Buss, Marisha Ray, Liam O'Brien, and Taliesin Jaffe to give out fan art and gif of the week prizes, discuss Critical Role episode 87, and answer questions.

9.title: Talking Critical Role - Tangled Depths: Episode #88
9.plot: Brian Wayne Foster is joined by guests Gil Ramirez, Matthew Mercer, Marisha Ray, and Travis Willingham to discuss the last episode of Critical Role, give out prizes, and answer questions.

10.title: Talking Critical Role - Curious Tides: Episode #89
10.plot: Brian Wayne Foster is joined by Liam O'Brien, Laura Bailey, and Travis Willingham to discuss episode 89 of Critical Role, give out prizes, and answer questions.

11.title: Talking Critical Role - Voice of the Tempest: Episode #90
11.plot: Brian Wayne Foster is joined by Marisha Ray, Liam O'Brien, and Sam Riegel for Talks Machina. They discuss Critical Role episode 90, answer questions, give away prizes, and more.

12.title: Talking Critical Role - Vox Machina Goes to Hell: Episode #91
12.plot: The adventures of Critical Role's party, Vox Machina, are discussed and dissected with host Brian Wayne Foster on this show-after-the-show. The show also features cast member appearances, fan creations, questions and interactions--plus giveaways.

13.title: Talks Machina Live From WonderCon
13.plot: Brian Wayne Foster is joined by the cast of Critical Role - live in Anaheim at WonderCon 2017. The cast talks about their experiences and answer questions from the audience.

14.title: Talking Critical Role - Bats Out of Hell: Episode #93
14.plot: Brian Wayne Foster is joined by Sam Riegel, Liam O'Brien, Travis Willingham, and Noelle Stevenson for Talks Machina. This week, they discuss Critical Role episode 93, give away GIF and fan art of the week prizes, and answer questions.

15.title: Talking Critical Role - Jugs and Rods: Episode #94
15.plot: The adventures of Critical Role's party, Vox Machina, are discussed and dissected with host Brian Wayne Foster on this show-after-the-show. The show also features cast member appearances, fan creations, questions and interactions--plus giveaways.

16.title: Talking Liam's Quest
16.plot: Brian Wayne Foster is joined by Liam O'Brien, Travis Willingham, and Ashley Johnson. The three discuss Liam's Quest, give out prizes, and more.

17.title: Talking Critical Role: Episodes #95 & #96
17.plot: Brian Wayne Foster is your host for Talks Machina. He's joined by Ashley Johnson, Travis Willingham, and Laura Bailey to discuss Critical Role episodes 95 and 96, give out fan art and GIF of the week prizes, and answer questions.

18.title: Talking Critical Role - The Mines of the Many: Episode #98
18.plot: Brian Wayne Foster is joined by Laura Bailey, Marisha Ray, and Liam O'Brien discuss CR #98 and answer questions about Galdric, Kiki's leadership, and more.

19.title: Talking Critical Role - Battle Royale
19.plot: Brian Wayne Foster is joined by guests Taliesin Jaffe, Matthew Mercer, and Marisha Ray to discuss their time at MomoCon, the epic Critical Role Battle Royale, and give out prizes to fans.

20.title: Talking Critical Role - Masquerade: Episode #99
20.plot: Brian Wayne Foster is joined by Sam Riegel, Laura Bailey, and Ashley Johnson to discuss the 99th episode of Critical Role. The four discuss Scanlan's controversial return, give away prizes, and flip the tables during the After Dark segment where Sam takes over as host.

21.title: Talking Critical Role - Unfinished Business: Episode #100
21.plot: Brian Wayne Foster is joined by Ashley Johnson, Travis Willingham, and Marisha Ray to discuss the 100th episode of Critical Role, give away prizes, and celebrate the 28th episode of Talks Machina.

22.title: Talking Critical Role - Thar Amphala: Episode #101
22.plot: It's time to get turned for Talks Machina. Brian Wayne Foster is joined by Taliesin Jaffe, Ashley Johnson, and Liam O'Brien to discuss episode 101 of Critical Role, give out fan art prizes, and answer questions.

23.title: Talking Critical Role - Race to the Tower: Episode #102

24.title: Talking Critical Role - Episodes #103 and #104

26.plot: During San Diego Comic-Con 2017, Brian Wayne Foster was joined by the whole cast of Critical Role to talk announcements, Critical Role, and answer questions from the audience.

27.title: Talking Critical Role - The Endless Atheneum: Episode #106

imdb.title: Talks Machina
plot: The follow-up Q/A show about Critical Role episodes that have been broadcasted. Hosted by the ostentatious Brian Wayne Foster.::chinphilip25
